title: [HCM] Senior PHP Backend Developer
[HCM] Senior PHP Backend Developer
mo_ta: - Join team developing web project and new project (eLearning platform)
- Learn new technology to enhance performance of web project
- Working cross-team in implemented projects or collecting requirements for further development. Involving in technologies evaluation and selection if needed in order to implement new solutions.
- Competitive salary: $800 - $1500 per month/based on candidate's ability + Bonus every month.
- Energetic, dynamic working environments with sharp and smart co-workers.
- Opportunity to learn and expose to new learning technology
- 13th monthly salary, evaluate personnel twice a year.
- Free tuition for all courses on Kyna.vn (over 700 quality courses).
- Other benefits according to Vietnamese law

yeu_cau: - Bachelor/ College's Degree with major in IT or equivalent.
- About 2 -> 3 years working in PHP
- Have the company vision, customer and the product strategy in mind
- Can read english in working
- Experience in HTML, CSS, ReactJS, React Native is advance

title: Lập Trình Java (Hà Nội)
mo_ta: - System design, development of customer's business system.
- System design, development of own services
- Work location: Cau Giay, Ha Noi
- Working hours: Mon - Fri, 8:00 - 17:00
- Allowance for over time, birthdays, weddings, good language (English / Japanese), company trip
yeu_cau: - Male/female, under 26 years old, university graduate
- Understanding on Java design pattern
- Experience of Java framework is required such as Spring MVC or Play framework.
- Can communicate in English (lower intermediate level)
